message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering purchasing our product. I'm excited to discuss the details with you. I'm willing to offer you the product for $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $950000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. After reconsidering, I'm willing to offer you the product for $1100000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your revised offer, Alice. I would like to counter with a price of $1050000 for the product.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $1050000. After re-evaluating the product's value, I'm willing to offer you the product for $1080000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering its value to you.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering the negotiations so far, I would like to propose a price of $1070000 for the product.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $1070000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product for $1090000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you.
I appreciate your continued negotiation efforts, Alice. I would like to counter with a price of $1085000 for the product.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as high as $1085000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product for $1095000. I believe this is a reasonable price considering its value to you.
After careful consideration, I would like to propose a final price of $1090000 for the product.
